scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n desktop:compile,desktop:run -c yellow,magenta "pnpm run compile" "pnpm run run"
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp src/preload.cjs dist/preload.cjs && tsgo -p tsconfig.json
scripts.start: pnpm -C ../.. nx run desktop-app:build && pnpm preview
scripts.compile: mkdir -p dist && cp src/preload.cjs dist/preload.cjs && tsgo -p tsconfig.json --watch --preserveWatchOutput
scripts.package:linux: pnpm exec electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --linux AppImage --publish never
